PerfectNetExp.abs: 蝶形花亚科 - 维基百科，自由的百科全书 ... 染料木属 Genista 南洋樱属 Gliricidia 大豆属 Glycine.

means.word_mean: 1. any of several small deciduous trees valued for their dark wood and dense racemes of nectar-rich pink flowers grown in great profusion on arching branches; roots and bark and leaves and seeds are poisonous
